short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Corrects articles about Rapist Brock Turner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that changes cases of Stanford Swimmer to RAPIST. 

Because it's IRRELEVANT THAT HE'S A SWIMMER and the media won't call him the rapist that he is.
